Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> Just now, Red Iron Crown said:
> 
> 
> [@FiiZzioN](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/108954-fiizzion/) Nyancat appears for everyone using MM on April 1, 64-bit or not. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
> 

Thank you for letting me know that my game is still working just fine. I love you ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif ":kiss:")

Hi guys!

As I was expecting, after playing a bit with 1.1 prerelease of KSP. This tool will not be needed at all! So the lifecycle of this tool will end soon - maybe in the next 6 months as soon as the most part of the mods  have been ported to 1.1.

BTW: How are modders [@ferram4](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/21328-ferram4/) [@NathanKell](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/75006-nathankell/)  doing porting to 1.1? Is it hard??

Cheers!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-04-05T20:07:41Z" title="04/05/2016 08:07  PM" data-short="8 yr">April 5, 2016</time> by jrodriguez**
